per_frame_1=ra = 2*3.1415;
per_frame_2=t= time*5;
per_frame_3=c = 1.7;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=r = sin(t)*c;
per_frame_6=r = if( above(r,1),1,r);
per_frame_7=r = if( below(r,0),0,r);
per_frame_8=r = r;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=g = sin(t+2*ra/3)*c;
per_frame_11=g = if( above(g,1),1,g);
per_frame_12=g = if( below(g,0),0,g);
per_frame_13=g = g;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=b = sin(t-2*ra/3)*c;
per_frame_17=b = if( above(b,1),1,b);
per_frame_18=b = if( below(b,0),0,b);
per_frame_19=b = b;
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=ib_r = r;
per_frame_22=ib_g = g;
per_frame_23=ib_b = b;
per_pixel_1=d = sqrt((x-0.5)*(x-0.5)+(y-0.5)*(y-0.5));
per_pixel_2=s = -1/(1+pow(2,(d-0.3-sin(ang*5+bass*5+time*5)*0.4)*10))+1;
per_pixel_3=dx = (-x+0.5)*(-0.1*s + (1-s)*0.3)*(rad+0.1) ;
per_pixel_4=dy = (-y+0.5)*(-0.1*s + (1-s)*0.3)*(rad+0.1);
